summary: A simple .bat which can be run on levelup to simply increment your unarmed damage by 1. Nothing overpowering but useful to help it\'s scaling at higher levels where it would normally start to be quite :( by comparison to any other combat style.
descriptionHtml:
1.Place lvlunarmed.txt into your root Skyrim directory.
2.In game upon leveling up hit ~ and enter batunarmed
3.That\'s it.
4.Resist the urge to be a powerfreak and enter it 9 million times and own everything. If your play experience is spoiled I am not to blame if you do so.

A simple .bat which can be run on leveling up to simply increment your unarmed damage by 1. Nothing overpowering (or even really noticeable without at least a few level gains) but useful to help it\'s scaling at higher levels where it would normally start to be quite :( by comparison to any other combat style.
I was hoping to automate this process to upon level up but not good enough to pull that off without the construction kit. x.x If anyone else would care to let me know how to automate the process it would be appreciated. So enjoy!
author: Borch1d
